languages.text: {n}Сверкнув очами, маршал сухо изрекает:{/n} "Я не могу и не желаю говорить на эту тему".
{n}His eyes glittering, the Marshal says curtly,{/n} "I am unable and unwilling to discuss the subject."
languages.original_text: {n}Сверкнув очами, маршал сухо изрекает:{/n} "Я не могу и не желаю говорить на эту тему".

traits.locale_text: {n}His eyes glittering, the Marshal says curtly,{/n} "I am unable and unwilling to discuss the subject."
{n}His eyes glittering, the Marshal says curtly,{/n} "I am unable and unwilling to discuss the subject."

{n}His eyes glittering, the Marshal says curtly,{/n} "I am unable and unwilling to discuss the subject."
{n}His eyes glittering, the Marshal says curtly,{/n} "I am unable and unwilling to discuss the subject."

languages.text: {n}Mit funkelnden Augen erklärt der Marschall höflich:{/n} "Ich bin weder in der Lage, noch bereit, dieses Thema zu erörtern."
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes glittering, the Marshal says curtly,{/n} "I am unable and unwilling to discuss the subject."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit funkelnden Augen erklärt der Marschall höflich:{/n} "Ich bin weder in der Lage, noch bereit, dieses Thema zu erörtern."

languages.text: {n}Les yeux brillants, le maréchal répond sur un ton sec :{/n} « Je ne peux ni ne veux discuter de ce sujet. »
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes glittering, the Marshal says curtly,{/n} "I am unable and unwilling to discuss the subject."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux brillants, le maréchal répond sur un ton sec :{/n} « Je ne peux ni ne veux discuter de ce sujet. »

languages.text: {n}将帥は目をギラギラさせながら、ぶっきらぼうに言った。{/n}「その件について話すつもりはありませんし、話せる立場でもありません」
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes glittering, the Marshal says curtly,{/n} "I am unable and unwilling to discuss the subject."

traits.locale_text: {n}将帥は目をギラギラさせながら、ぶっきらぼうに言った。{/n}「その件について話すつもりはありませんし、話せる立場でもありません」

languages.text: {n}Con ojos brillantes, el mariscal afirma brevemente:{/n} «No estoy en posición de hablar del tema ni pienso hacerlo».
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes glittering, the Marshal says curtly,{/n} "I am unable and unwilling to discuss the subject."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con ojos brillantes, el mariscal afirma brevemente:{/n} «No estoy en posición de hablar del tema ni pienso hacerlo».

languages.text: {n}元帅两眼放光，简短地回答道。{/n}“我不能，也不愿讨论这个问题。”
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes glittering, the Marshal says curtly,{/n} "I am unable and unwilling to discuss the subject."

traits.locale_text: {n}元帅两眼放光，简短地回答道。{/n}“我不能，也不愿讨论这个问题。”

languages.text: {n}Gözleri parıldayan Miralay, kısa bir yanıtla kestirip atıyor.{/n} "Bu meseleyi konuşmaya ne yetkim var ne de isteğim."
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes glittering, the Marshal says curtly,{/n} "I am unable and unwilling to discuss the subject."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözleri parıldayan Miralay kısa bir yanıtla kestirip atıyor.{/n} "Bu meseleyi konuşmaya yetkim ve isteğim yok."
